cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENTPrinted for-the-War Cabinet. February 1945..SECRET.W.M. (45)4 th Conclusions.Copy No. 52WAR CABINET 16 (45).CONCLUSIONS of a Meeting of the War Cabinet held in the Cabinet war room on Thursday,-8th February, 1945, at 5-30 p.m. and 10-30 p.m.Present:The Right Hon. C. R. Attlee, M.P., Deputy Prime Minister (in the Chair).The Right Hon. Sir John Anderson,- M.P., Chancellor of the Exchequer.The Right Hon. Oliver Lyttelton,M.P., Minister of Production.The Right Hon. Ernest Bevin, M.P.,Minister of Labour and NationalService.The Right Hon. Herbert Morrison,M.P., Secretary of State for theHome Department and Minister ofHome Security.The Right Hon. Lord Woolton,Minister of Reconstruction.The following were also present:The Right Hon. Viscount Cranborne,Secretary of State for DominionAffairs.The Right Hon. L. S. Amery, M.P.,Secretary of State for India and secretary of State for Burma.The Right Hon. Sir James Grigg,M.P., Secretary of State for War.The Right Hon. Sir Stafford Cripps,K.C., M.P., Minister of aircraft production. (At 5-30 p.m. Meetingonly.)The Right Hon: Richard Law, M.P.,Minister of State.Colonel The Right Hon. oliver stanley, M.P., Secretary of Statefor the Colonies.The Right Hon. Lord Beaverbrook,Lord Privy Seal.The Right Hon. A. V. Alexander,M.P., First Lord of the Admiralty.The Right Hon. Sir archibald sinclair, Bt., M.P., Secretary ofState for Air.The Right Hon. Brendan Bracken,M.P., Minister of Information.The Right Hon. Lord Cherwell, Pay-master-General.Sir Orme Sargent, Deputy Under-Secretary of State for ForeignAffairs.Secretary, Sir [Gilbert Laithwaite.Contents.Subject.Conference of Heads of Governments.[29485-1] Conference of heads of governments.(previous reference:W.M.(45)15thConclusions,Minute 1.)The War Cabinet bad before them reports from the PrimeMinister and the Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs on a numberof points which had been raised in the Conference of Heads of governments now proceeding.A record of the discussion and of the conclusions reachedis contained m the Secretary's Standard File of War cabinet conclusions.Offices of the War Cabinet, 8. W. I,8th February, 1945.
